message: Bob, I believe this product presents a unique opportunity and is priced to reflect its value. I'm happy to offer it to you for $2,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for considering my request. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,800,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is generous, the product's inherent value and potential warrant a price closer to my initial proposal. I could consider letting it go for $1,950,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,900,000 for the product.
